name: lanidrac-backend
description: ``` Lanidrac-backend/ ├── app/                      # Application package │   ├── api/                 # API endpoints │   │   └── v1/              # API version 1 │   │       ├── endpoints/   # Route handlers │   │       │   ├── health.py │   │       │   └── upload.py │   │       └── api.py       # Main API router │   ├── core/                # Core configuration │   │   ├── config.py        # Settings and configuration │   │   └── database.py      # Database setup │   ├── models/              # SQLAlchemy models │   │   └── document.py      # Document model │   ├── schemas/             # Pydantic schemas │   │   └── document.py      # Request/Response models │   ├── services/            # Business logic │   │   └── upload_service.py │   └── utils/               # Utilities │       └── file_utils.py    # File handling utilities ├── uploads/                 # Uploaded files directory ├── main.py                  # Application entry point ├── docker-compose.yml       # PostgreSQL setup ├── Dockerfile               # Container configuration └── requirements.txt         # Python dependencies ```
